title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 373: Featuring Nathan Gerbe
description:
On Episode 373 of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Nathan Gerbe. Nathan joined (01:35:10) to discuss his prolific NCAA career, being one of the shortest players in NHL history, and his intense childhood. But first, the guys open the show discussing the Super Bowl, Whit’s trip to Florida, Biz’s trip to Aspen and tons more. The guys also get into all the NHL news, including the firings in Montreal and Edmonton. The guys finish up the show discussing the Brad Marchand sussy and how great the Waste Management Open is for Golf.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
